meanings.definition: A person who works on a railroad.
meanings.sent1: The railroaders fixed the tracks to keep the trains running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The railroaders were busy repairing the train engine.
meanings.sent3: The railroaders joked about racing each other on the tracks during their break.
meanings.sent4: The railroaders were the backbone of the transportation system, keeping everything on track.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated railroaders worked tirelessly to ensure the trains ran on time.

meanings.definition: A group of people who work on railroads.
meanings.sent1: The team of railroaders collaborated to lay down new tracks for the upcoming train.
meanings.sent2: The railroaders gathered for a meeting to discuss the maintenance schedule.
meanings.sent3: The railroaders celebrated a successful year with a barbecue party by the tracks.
meanings.sent4: The railroaders moved in unison, like a well-oiled machine, to complete the railway extension.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated railroaders formed a strong bond while working together on the railroad projects.
